trigger_event: After the citywide appearance of BCI echoes exposing private histories, Nikola Petrak gains brief access to a hidden messaging function in the BCI system as the Council urgently seeks to regain control over the spiraling crisis.
dilemma: Should Nikola unlock and release the poetic message Halden left—guiding citizens toward peaceful unity and symbolic resistance—or should he expose the full, raw archive of historic BCI abuses, unleashing painful truths and opening the door to direct public reckoning?
reason: Nikola is torn between wanting to preserve hard-won stability with a humane gesture and facing the risk that only honesty and public exposure will lead to real renewal. The trauma caused by the resurging BCI echoes makes either path dangerous, and he fears either a descent into chaos or the loss of the system’s remaining soul.
choice_a: Release Halden’s poetic message in the BCI echoes, turning agitation into a wave of peaceful civil unity.
belief_a: Peaceful unity is more healing than revenge.
A symbolic gesture can prevent the system from collapsing into chaos.
Halden’s legacy is best honored through human connection, not disruption.
choice_b: Expose the archived record of Council manipulations and BCI abuses, forcing public assemblies and system-wide accountability.
belief_b: True healing needs total honesty and exposure of past wrongs.
Civic renewal can only arise from public reckoning and transparency.
Real power must return to the people, however messy the process.
